info.game_comments:
(Lin-Manuel Miranda: I'm Lin-Manuel Miranda.  I wrote and star in the Broadway musical Hamilton.  Clues about Alexander Hamilton coming up on Jeopardy!)

WE ASKED: Hamilton's Lin-Manuel Miranda.

jeopardy_round: LAST NAMES IN THE HARRY POTTER BOOKS

(1, 1).clue: He presided over "The West Wing" as President Jed Bartlet

(2, 1).clue: This feminine first name plus the last name of flour company executive William Crocker equaled instant icon

(6, 1).clue: In the show, this rival prophetically warns Hamilton, "Talk less, smile more, don't let them know what you're against or what you're for, you wanna get ahead?  Fools who run their mouths off wind up dead"--he was right

(1, 2).clue: Show with Pres. Frank Underwood; I must confess that I do enjoy Frank's asides directly to the audience

(2, 2).clue: Why a talking this type of lizard in a GEICO ad?  In its words, "Because people trust advertising icons"

(6, 2).clue: In the show, the Thomas Jefferson character performs "What'd I Miss""So, what did I miss? /What did I miss? /Virginia, my home, sweet home /I want to give you a kiss"What Jefferson missed was America's post-war development while he was away as minister to this country

(1, 3).clue: David Palmer was assassinated on this fast-paced show--guess he wasn't in good hands

(2, 3).clue: This rotund figure was once drawn "drinking" nails to show that driving over them didn't bother his tires

(6, 3).clue: "You cry in your tea which you hurl in the sea when you see me go by why so sad?  Remember we made an arrangement when you went away, now you're making me mad", rants this king

(1, 4).clue: Selina Meyer took a step up from this show's title

(2, 4).clue: Jonathan Goldsmith plays this man in Dos Equis commercials
(2, 4).correct response: the Most Interesting Man in the World

(4, 4).clue: Godric--it adorns a house at Hogwarts

(6, 4).clue: "How does the bastard orphan immigrant decorated war vet unite the colonies through more debt?" is asked about Hamilton shortly after he begins to run this Cabinet department

(1, 5).clue: This show featured Laura Roslin, a politician unafraid to come out strongly against Cylon attacks

(2, 5).clue: A cat with 9 lives has represented this battery brand since the 1930s

(4, 5).clue: We'll take offense if you don't know this last name of bossy Dolores

(6, 5).clue: A highlight of Act I is our staging of this climactic Virginia battte of 1781, in which Hamilton led an attack; it's where the British ultimatety surrendered the war

(1, 1).clue: This pop artist's museum opened in 1994 & is one of the 4 Carnegie Museums of Pittsburgh

(2, 1).clue: If nose is your job title, you create these, perhaps for Guerlain

(4, 1).clue: Now synonymous with taking a brief break from a long period of sitting, it may date back to an 1882 baseball game

(5, 1).clue: Great St. Bernard Pass through these mountains is one of the most ancient routes between Italy & Switzerland

(6, 1).clue: He shared an Oscar, a Grammy & 4 of his Tonys with Oscar Hammerstein II

(1, 2).clue: A museum devoted to this scientist & inventor is housed in what was originally the Tuskegee campus laundry

(2, 2).clue: Puppygate was a 2015 scandal that rocked these awards for science fiction authors

(4, 2).clue: This 3-word phrase at the end of Warner Bros. cartoons was first uttered in 1930

(5, 2).clue: Route 61 passes through Schuylkill Gap just north of the city of Hamburg in this state

(6, 2).clue: Robert Lopez completed his EGOT in 2015 with an Oscar for this "Frozen" tune

(1, 3).clue: In Salzburg you can visit the house where he was born & see such mementos as his childhood violin & his clavichord

(2, 3).clue: This sea creature uses the snout that gives it its name to detect the electrical field of its prey

(4, 3).clue: A vessel holding water or feed for animals, it now also means a source of illicit income, like for politicians

(5, 3).clue: For several decades, Dixville Notch in this state traditionally has voted first in the U.S. presidential elections

(6, 3).clue: She's seen here in 1977--the year she won the Emmy to complete her quartet
